orig=The ice bridge has formed and crossing is now made with safety. The roads between the city and St. Lambert, Laprairie and Longueuil are in good condition, but in some places still a little rough, though not so much so as in former years. A good fall of snow would make them perfect and render crossing more a pleasure than a task. mno|Local time: daily|QC flag: None|Image File: MontrealGazette_NP-100_PQ_1880-01-07_NP.png

orig=Sorrel, January 23 - The weather last night and today has been the coldest we have had this winter. Thermometer this morning stood 25° below zero. There was a slight fall of snow yesterday. Roads very heavy. mno|Local time: daily|QC flag: None|Image File: MontrealGazette_NP-100_PQ_1882-01-24_NP.png
